definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to row/to paddle/profitable/worth (the effort)/it pays (to do sth)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character

sentences.english: The general ordered me to strategize.
sentences.chinese: 将军责成我制订战略行动计划。

sentences.english: Every year, an action plan is prepared ahead of monsoon season.
sentences.chinese: 每年赶在季风季节前，苏拉特已作好行动计划。

sentences.english: We have a ten-point emergency act ion plan for america.
sentences.chinese: 我们对美国有一个十万火急的行动计划。

sentences.english: They laid their heads together, and devised a plan for robbing the bank.
sentences.chinese: 他们一起密谋策划，制定了抢劫银行的行动计划。

sentences.english: He offers up his services to finish the operation.
sentences.chinese: 他毛遂自荐来完成这个行动计划。

sentences.english: I encourage us all to incorporate tithing into our savings plan of action.
sentences.chinese: 我鼓励大家把奉献变成我们的储蓄行动计划。

sentences.english: The procedures and event action plans shall be fully implemented throughout the construction period.
sentences.chinese: 程序及事件行动计划须在整段建造工程期间完全执行。

sentences.english: Once your group agrees on an action, create an action plan.
sentences.chinese: 一旦团队在行动上达成一致，那么建立一个行动计划。

sentences.english: The action plan, which you will be discussing, deserves our urgent attention.
sentences.chinese: 大家将要讨论的行动计划值得我们立即加以关注。

sentences.english: Third, , China will implement the action plan on strengthening security of radioactive sources.
sentences.chinese: 第三，中国将实施加强放射源安全行动计划。

sentences.english: But, for the financial industry, there was an action plan.
sentences.chinese: 但是，在金融产业也有一项行动计划。

sentences.english: These Demand Side theorists are giving you a plan of action.
sentences.chinese: 这些需求方面的理论家正向你提供一项行动计划。

sentences.english: The revised policy and action plan work in parallel.
sentences.chinese: 修订后的政策和行动计划并行开展工作。

sentences.english: The "test" of the action plan are the customers voting with their wallets.
sentences.chinese: 关于行动计划的“测试”就是消费者购买行为的体现。

sentences.english: This is pretty straightforward stuff, but is an essential ingredient of this action plan.
sentences.chinese: 这一步很简单，但却是整个行动计划不可或缺的一步。

sentences.english: Isan Energy Management Action Plan and Awareness Campaign in place?
sentences.chinese: 是否设有能源管理行动计划和宣传活动？

definition: plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
Made in China 2025, strategic plan to upgrade Chinese industry especially in high-tech areas, approved by China's State Council in 2015
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Zhi4 zao4 er4 ling2 er4 wu3

definition: to impel/to carry forward/to push on/to advance/to drive forward
